en.title: Add information to a case
en.hint: Please provide any additional relevant information that you would like to add to this case. Don't include personal financial information, such as your bank details.
en.line1: You may want to submit other documents, files or evidence that provides the Tribunal with more information about your case.
en.line2: This will depend on the nature of your appeal, application or claim.  Specific examples can be found in your completed tribunal form.
en.line4: Please explain why you feel this document is relevant to your case
en.uploadExamples:
• copies of any relevant correspondence or documentation
  • audio or video recordings
  • written statements
  • related reports
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
  • File size per document: up to 100 megabytes (MB)
  • File size per multimedia file: 100 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected
  • Only a maximum of 20 files can be uploaded on this page

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.
en.uploadGuidance: Once you have selected the file click "Upload file" to upload it.
en.additionalInfo: For each piece of additional information or evidence you are submitting, please state why it is relevant to your case.

cy.title: Ychwanegu gwybodaeth at achos
cy.hint: Darparwch unrhyw wybodaeth berthnasol ychwanegol yr hoffech ei hychwanegu at yr achos hwn. Peidiwch â chynnwys unrhyw wybodaeth ariannol bersonol, megis eich manylion banc.
cy.line1: Efallai y byddwch eisiau cyflwyno dogfennau, ffeiliau neu dystiolaeth arall sy’n rhoi mwy o wybodaeth i’r Tribiwnlys am eich achos.
cy.line2: Bydd hyn yn dibynnu ar natur eich apêl, cais neu hawliad. Gellir dod o hyd i enghreifftiau penodol yn y ffurflen tribiwnlys rydych wedi’i llenwi.
cy.line4: Eglurwch pam eich bod yn teimlo bod y ddogfen hon yn berthnasol i’ch achos
cy.uploadExamples:
• copïau o unrhyw ohebiaeth neu ddogfennau perthnasol
  • recordiadau sain neu fideo
  • datganiadau ysgrifenedig
  • adroddiadau perthnasol
cy.uploadRequirement:
• Fformatau ffeiliau: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, GIF, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
  • Maint ffeil pob dogfen: hyd at 100 megabeit (MB)
  • Maint pob ffeil amlgyfrwng: 100 megabeit (MB)
  • Ni ellir llwytho ffeiliau sydd wedi’u diogelu â chyfrinair

Ni allwch lwytho ffeiliau gweithredu (.exe), ffeiliau zip neu ffeiliau eraill oherwydd y risg o firws.
cy.uploadGuidance: Unwaith y byddwch wedi dewis y ffeil, cliciwch ar "Llwytho ffeil" i’w llwytho.
cy.additionalInfo: Ar gyfer pob darn o dystiolaeth ychwanegol rydych yn ei chyflwyno, nodwch pam ei bod yn berthnasol i’ch achos.

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds the maximum permitted value. Upload a file that is less than 100 MB
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 20 files only. Delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Document upload or deletion has failed. Try again

cy.SIZE_ERROR: Mae’r ffeil yn fwy na’r maint mwyaf a ganiateir. Llwythwch ffeil sy’n llai na 100Mb
cy.FORMAT_ERROR: Dim ond ffeiliau yn y fformatau canlynol y gall y gwasanaeth hwn dderbyn - MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF, MP4, MP3
cy.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: Gallwch lwytho hyd at 20 ffeil yn unig. Dylech ddileu un o’r ffeiliau a llwythwyd a rhoi cynnig arall arni
cy.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Mae llwytho neu ddileu’r ffeil wedi methu. Rhowch gynnig arall arni
